job_description:
Project Coordinator

We are looking for a responsible Project Coordinator to administer and organize all types of projects, from simple activities to more complex plans.

The Project Coordinator's responsibilities include working closely with our technical project managers to prepare comprehensive action plans, including resources, timeframes, and budgets for projects. You will perform various coordinating tasks, like schedule and risk management, along with administrative duties, like maintaining project documentation and handling financial queries.

To succeed in this role, you should have excellent time management and communication skills, as you’ll collaborate with clients from all over the world and internal teams to deliver results on deadlines. Ultimately, the Project Coordinator’s duties are to ensure that all projects are completed on time, within budget, and meet high-quality standards.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Coordinate project management activities, resources, equipment, and information.
  • Break projects into doable actions and set timeframes.
  • Liaise with clients to identify and define requirements, scope, and objectives.
  • Assign tasks to internal teams and assist with schedule management.
  • Make sure that clients’ needs are met as projects evolve.
  • Help prepare quotes and other related documents.
  • Analyze risks and opportunities.
  • Monitor project progress and handle any issues that arise.
  • Act as the point of contact and communicate project status to all participants.
  • Work with the Technical Project Manager to eliminate blockers.
  • Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, plans, and reports.
  • Ensure standards and requirements are met through conducting quality assurance tests.

Requirements and Skills:

  • 1 to 3 years of experience in a similar role.
  • Excellent English verbal and written communication.
  • Should have experience in managing Web Development projects.
  • Should have a clear understanding of web technologies in general.
  • Experience in project management, from conception to delivery.
  • An ability to prepare and interpret flowcharts, schedules, and step-by-step action plans.
  • Solid organizational skills, including multitasking and time-management.
  • Strong client-facing and teamwork skills.
  • Familiarity with risk management and quality assurance control.

Application Instructions:

Submit your CV via the form here: https://jobs.phases.dk

Please do not call or email directly regarding this opening. We will only consider applications submitted through the official job application form linked here.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at _@c.c
summary: Seeking a responsible Project Coordinator to manage diverse projects. Responsibilities include planning, scheduling, risk analysis, and client liaison to ensure timely, on-budget, high-quality project delivery.

job_description:
Pathologist (Oncology-Focused, AI & Digital Pathology)

Location: Hybrid and Remote (Kochi Office visits as needed) Reports to: Head of Medical Affairs & Chief Clinical Officer Department: Clinical & Medical Affairs – Pathology

About ThinkBio.ai

ThinkBio.ai is a fast-growing health-tech company at the intersection of AI, precision medicine, and clinical innovation, with a vision to transform care delivery in oncology and beyond. We integrate advanced computational models with deep clinical expertise to build solutions for early detection, diagnosis, treatment personalization, and digital pathology workflows.

We are seeking a motivated Pathologist with strong foundations in pathology (oncology focus preferred) and a passion for AI, digital pathology, and translational innovation.

Role Overview

The Pathologist will serve as a key clinical expert for ThinkBio.ai’s pathology initiatives. The role combines oncopathology expertise with broader pathology knowledge, content validation, and knowledge creation to support AI-powered solutions. This position requires both academic rigor and innovation, working closely with clinicians, scientists, and engineers.

Key Responsibilities

Pathology & Oncology Expertise

  • Provide domain expertise in oncopathology (priority) while supporting other pathology areas as required.
  • Stay updated on latest advances in pathology (diagnostics, biomarkers, classifications, molecular assays).
  • Ensure accuracy and clinical reliability in pathology-focused content validation.

AI, Digital & Telepathology

  • Collaborate on projects in digital pathology, telepathology, and AI-driven workflows.
  • Validate AI model outputs related to histopathology, tumor grading, classification, and biomarker detection.

Content & Knowledge Development

  • Validate medical content (MBBS-level and above) for accuracy and clinical alignment.
  • Create pathology notes, structured resources, and knowledge graphs for disease segments in focus.
  • Reference standard pathology textbooks and guidelines in all deliverables.

Reporting & Collaboration

  • Provide weekly summary reports of activities and contributions.
  • Work as part of a multidisciplinary team with clinicians, researchers, and data scientists.
  • Deliver 1–2 online presentations per month to clinical and non-clinical teams.
  • Share innovative ideas and inputs to guide research and product development.

Qualifications & Requirements

  • MD in Pathology (mandatory).
  • 1 year of job experience preferable (oncology-related experience strongly valued).
  • Strong understanding of oncopathology, tumor biology, and biomarkers, plus general pathology knowledge.
  • Familiarity with digital pathology, telepathology, and AI applications in pathology.
  • Demonstrated ability to validate pathology-specific content accurately.
  • Excellent communication skills, with ability to present to both clinicians and non-clinicians.
  • Good work ethics, flexibility in working hours, and willingness to travel frequently to the Kochi office.
  • Passion for AI advancements in pathology and a collaborative, innovative mindset.

Preferred Attributes

  • Prior experience in oncology diagnostics or exposure to multi-specialty pathology.
  • Strong academic referencing and ability to translate complex pathology into structured knowledge.
  • Team-oriented with a problem-solving and innovative outlook.

Why Join Us?

  • Contribute to shaping the future of AI in pathology and oncology care.
  • Collaborate with a diverse team of clinicians, pathologists, data scientists, and AI engineers.
  • Hybrid flexibility, dynamic work culture, and opportunities to lead knowledge-driven innovation.
  • Play a critical role in bridging clinical pathology expertise with digital transformation.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@feathersoft.com
summary: Pathologist needed for AI and digital pathology initiatives in oncology. Responsibilities include content validation, AI model output review, and knowledge creation. Requires MD in Pathology and interest in AI applications.

job_description:
SQL Database Administrator

As an SQL Database Administrator, you will be responsible for the setup, performance, integrity, and security of SQL Server databases. Your role will also include planning and development, as well as troubleshooting issues on behalf of the users.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Installation, Configuration, and Maintenance
    • Install, configure, and upgrade SQL Server instances.
    • Set up advanced features like Always On Availability Groups and failover clustering.
  2. Performance Tuning and Optimization
    • Monitor database performance and identify bottlenecks.
    • Optimize queries, manage indexes, and adjust server configurations for optimal performance.
  3. Backup and Recovery
    • Design and implement robust backup and recovery strategies.
    • Conduct regular testing to ensure data integrity and minimize downtime during failures.
  4. High Availability and Disaster Recovery (HA/DR)
    • Implement and manage HA/DR solutions such as Always On, clustering, and log shipping.
    • Ensure business continuity through disaster recovery planning.
  5. Security and Compliance
    • Manage user access, roles, and permissions.
    • Enforce security policies and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
  6. Troubleshooting and Support
    • Diagnose and resolve database-related issues.
    • Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems.
    • Collaborate with developers to support database-related operations.
  7. Automation and Documentation
    • Develop scripts and tools to automate routine administrative tasks.
    • Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation of configurations, processes, and procedures.

job_description:
Senior Engineer (Real Money Gaming)

We are looking for a Senior Engineer to join our Real Money Gaming (RMG) platform team, focusing on RGS (Remote Game Server) game development. You will build high-performance, secure, and scalable backend systems that handle game sessions, secure wallet transactions, game state, and real-time events. Your work will directly support real-money casino games, ensuring compliance, responsible gaming, and seamless player experiences across web and mobile platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, and maintain backend systems and APIs for RMG platforms and RGS games using Node.js and TypeScript.
  • Integrate RGS games with the platform: session management, game state persistence, RNG (Random Number Generator) validation, bonus events, and win/loss processing.
  • Design and implement secure wallet systems, and integrate third-party wallet systems ensuring transaction integrity, atomicity, and auditability for deposits, bets, wins, and withdrawals.
  • Implement fraud detection, anti-cheat, and responsible gaming features.
  • Build real-time communication channels between RGS, platform, and frontend clients (WebSocket, Pub/Sub).
  • Optimize backend systems for high concurrency, low latency, and fault tolerance.
  • Collaborate on CI/CD pipelines, cloud deployments, and microservices architecture.
  • Monitor, debug, and continuously improve system performance and reliability.
  • Mentor junior engineers and provide guidance on RMG/RGS backend best practices.

Required Qualifications:

  • 6+ years of backend development experience, in RMG, online casinos, or sports betting platforms.
  • Strong expertise in Node.js and frameworks like Express or NestJS.
  • Proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript for backend development.
  • Hands-on experience with databases (SQL ; NoSQL), caching layers (Redis/Memcached), and message brokers (Kafka/RabbitMQ).
  • Solid understanding of real-time systems (WebSockets, Pub/Sub, message queues) and high-concurrency architectures.
  • Deep knowledge of authentication, authorization, encryption, and security best practices (JWT, OAuth, HTTPS, secure key storage).
  • Experience with payment gateways, wallets, and transaction security.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Strong debugging, profiling, and performance optimization skills.
  • Experience with RGS game server architecture and terminology: game sessions, spin results, RNG validation, bonus/feature events, jackpot integration, and state persistence.

Preferred Skills:

  • Knowledge of RMG regulatory compliance (KYC, responsible gaming, anti-fraud).
  • Familiarity with integration of backend APIs with frontend platforms.
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).
  • Understanding of microservices architecture for casino platforms.

How to Apply:

Send the CV to careersindia@rubyseven.com If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careersindia@rubyseven.com
summary: Senior Engineer for RMG platform focusing on RGS game development. Build high-performance, secure backend systems for real-money casino games. Requires 6+ years experience with Node.js and TypeScript.

job_description:
ERPNext Functional Engineer

Position Overview The ERPNext Functional Engineer is responsible for implementing, configuring, and supporting ERPNext across business functions — without writing code. This role focuses on understanding business processes, mapping them into ERPNext modules, configuring workflows, setting up masters, and ensuring seamless system adoption across departments.

Key Responsibilities

  1. Functional Implementation & Configuration

    • Analyze business requirements and translate them into ERPNext workflows and configurations.
    • Set up modules such as Sales, Purchase, Accounting, Inventory, CRM, Projects, HR, and Manufacturing based on client or internal needs.
    • Configure custom fields, print formats, role permissions, and reports using ERPNext’s built-in tools.
    • Manage data migration and master data setup (Items, Customers, Suppliers, BOMs, Chart of Accounts, etc.).

  2. Business Process Mapping

    • Conduct workshops with business users to understand existing processes.
    • Map current processes to ERPNext best practices and suggest process improvements.
    • Document business requirements, functional specifications, and user manuals.

  3. Testing & Validation

    • Prepare and execute test cases for module validation and UAT (User Acceptance Testing).
    • Identify gaps and coordinate with the technical/development team for solutions.
    • Verify system outputs, workflows, and reports align with business rules.

  4. User Training & Support

    • Conduct ERPNext training sessions for end-users and super-users.
    • Provide first-line functional support and troubleshoot configuration-related issues.
    • Create functional documentation, FAQs, and knowledge base materials.

  5. Coordination & Project Management

    • Collaborate with developers for technical customizations (without coding yourself).
    • Ensure tasks are tracked, tested, and deployed as per timelines.
    • Support project delivery by maintaining implementation checklists and status reports.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Information Systems, Accounting, or related field.
  • Experience: 1–4 years of experience in ERPNext or similar ERP systems (Odoo, SAP, Oracle, etc.) as a functional consultant/analyst.
  • Skills:
    • Strong understanding of business domains: Accounting, Sales, Purchase, Inventory, and HR.
    • Strong analytical and documentation skills.
    • Excellent communication and client-handling abilities.
    • Proficient in ERPNext setup and configuration (without programming).
    • Familiarity with Frappe Framework concepts is a plus (for coordination).
    • Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail.

Compensation: ₹2.5 LPA – ₹3.6 LPA for candidates with 1–2 years of functional/ERP experience.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@merabt.com
summary: Seeking an ERPNext Functional Engineer to implement and configure ERPNext. Responsibilities include business process mapping, configuration, testing, and user support without coding.

Company: ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd Location: 4th FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581 Website: https://www.ecesistech.com Contact Email: amrithas@ecesistech.com Closing Date: October 23, 2025 Job Published: October 18, 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking a highly motivated and ambitious Marketing Executive with 1 to 3 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate is a proactive individual who is not just looking for a job, but a career-defining opportunity. This is a high-impact role where you will report directly to senior management, working as a key individual contributor with the unique opportunity to create and lead our marketing team as we grow. You will be instrumental in driving our marketing initiatives, taking on significant responsibilities, and tackling the exciting challenges of exponential business growth. This role offers a chance to work in a vibrant, cross-cultural environment, crafting and executing strategies for a global audience with a special focus on the Japanese market.

Requirements

Qualifications:

  • Education: A bachelor’s degree in any field with a Master’s degree in marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
  • Experience: 1-3 years of proven experience in a B2B marketing role, preferably within the Technology, SaaS, or IT Services industry.

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategy & Execution: Assist in developing and implementing comprehensive B2B marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive lead generation, and support sales objectives.
  • Digital Marketing: Manage and execute campaigns across various digital channels including SEO/SEM, email marketing, social media (especially LinkedIn), and content marketing.
  • Content Creation: Develop compelling marketing collateral such as blog posts, case studies, whitepapers, social media updates, and website content tailored to a global B2B audience.
  • Japan Market Focus:
    • Conduct market research to understand the nuances, trends, and competitive landscape of the Japanese market.

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking a highly experienced Technical Project Manager (Tech PM) with over 13 years of experience to lead the complete execution of custom application development and integration projects. These projects are primarily built on .NET stacks, incorporating modern client frameworks and integration platforms. The ideal candidate will possess a robust technical background coupled with strong project delivery expertise, enabling them to manage complex, cross-functional initiatives from the initial discovery phase through to production rollout. This role demands hands-on experience across the entire software/product development lifecycle, including planning, estimation, design, development, testing, and release, while fostering close collaboration with engineering, product, and client stakeholders.

  • Manage the end-to-end delivery of custom software development and integration projects utilizing Java, .NET, and associated technologies.

Technical & Delivery Expertise - 13+ years of overall IT experience, with 4–6 years specifically in Technical Project Management. - Strong understanding of custom application development on Java/.NET stacks. - Proven experience managing: - Backend/API development - Integration using tools such as Apache Camel, IBM Integration Stack - Database interactions (Oracle, SQL Server) - Client-side development using React/Angular - Deployment on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) - Familiarity with Microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices is essential.

Project Management - Expertise in schedule planning, effort estimation, dependency tracking, and delivery monitoring. - Hands-on experience in managing scope and schedule changes, effective stakeholder communication, and issue escalation processes. - Proficiency with project management tools such as Jira, Confluence, MS Project, Git, Jenkins, or equivalent.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
  • Ability to clearly articulate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Basement Floor, Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum , 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Job Published: 16,Oct 2025 Closing Date: 22,Oct 2025 Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com

About the Role

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Pre-Sales Business Analyst to play a key role in supporting the sales cycle by translating customer needs into clear, solution-ready requirements and documentation. The role involves close collaboration with the PMO Delivery Director (primary reporting), as well as providing pre-sales support to the Strategic Business Director and Sales & Customer Success Executive through requirement gathering, solution scoping, and preparation of technical inputs for proposals and demos. The ideal candidate will ensure customer expectations are accurately understood, documented, and aligned with product capabilities before transition to delivery teams, and may also support early delivery phases to ensure smooth implementation planning.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Pre-Sales Discovery & Requirements Gathering - Attend client discovery calls and demos alongside the Strategic Business Director or Sales & Customer Success Executive. - Capture and document business needs, workflows, and functional expectations. - Clarify objectives, use cases, and customer challenges early in the sales cycle. - Translate discussions into structured requirement notes or actionable briefs.

2. Solution Scoping & Technical Documentation - Develop preliminary solution outlines, scope summaries, and feature mappings. - Create draft Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) or Functional Specifications (FSDs) when required. - Produce workflow diagrams, wireframes, or configuration concepts with support from the designer team when needed (e.g., using Figma, Lucidchart, Visio). - Align proposed solutions with product capabilities and delivery feasibility in coordination with PMO.

3. Proposal & Technical Input Support - Contribute the technical and functional sections of proposals, SOWs, capability decks, and solution documentation. - Provide supporting material such as feature breakdowns, workflow references, screenshots, or demo visuals. - Coordinate with PMs, Product Teams, and Solutions Architects to validate effort, timelines, and scope. - Ensure documentation libraries, templates, and proposal-related assets remain current and accurate.

4. Demo Support & Client Workshops - Assist in tailoring and preparing demos based on client requirements. - Support solution walkthroughs by demonstrating functionality, workflows, or configuration concepts. - Capture questions, required modifications, and follow-up actions from demos or workshops. - Provide functional clarity to the Sales & Customer Success Executive and Product Delivery teams.

5. Collaboration with Sales, Marketing & Technical Teams - Work with the Sales & Customer Success Executive to align scope, requirements, and customer expectations. - Provide technical input to marketing collateral when showcasing system workflows or configurations. - Support design and content teams with diagrams, Figma links, functionality clarifications, or feature visuals. - Coordinate early solution feasibility with PMO, developers, and product architects.

6. Delivery Handover & Flexible BA Support (Post-Sale) - Prepare structured handover notes for PMO, BA, and delivery teams to begin implementation. - Clarify assumptions, workflows, deliverables, and effort during pre-kick-off activities. - Where needed, transition temporarily into a Business Analyst role during project initiation. - Support configuration workshops, requirement validation, and solution alignment during onboarding.

Preferred Skills, Experience & Background

  • 2–4 years in pre-sales, business analysis, solution consulting, or functional coordination in a software/SaaS/IT environment.
  • Experience working with delivery, product, or technical teams to translate requirements into solutions.
  • Familiarity with software implementation lifecycles and client discovery processes.

Tools & Systems

  • Strong experience with Microsoft Office/365 (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).
  • Working knowledge of Jira or similar project/issue tracking tools.
  • Experience using diagramming or workflow tools (e.g., Visio, Lucidchart, Figma, Miro).

Skills & Capabilities

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to gather, structure, and document requirements clearly.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams (Sales, PMO, Delivery).
  • Good attention to detail and ability to handle multiple priorities.

Education

  • Bachelor’s degree in IT, Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.

Preferred:

Industry & Product Knowledge - Exposure to Lean, manufacturing, logistics, or process improvement environments. - Understanding of SaaS platforms, workflow-based systems, or ERP/MES/QMS tools.

Proposal & Demo Involvement - Experience contributing to proposals, solution decks, or SOWs. - Exposure to software demos, configuration showcases, or pre-sales workshops.

Collaboration & Market Alignment - Experience working with UK/Europe or international clients. - Ability to provide input into marketing or sales collateral (from a functional perspective).

Tools & Technology (Nice-to-Haves) - Familiarity with HubSpot or CRM platforms (viewing/updating deal notes, not ownership). - Experience using Figma or similar design reference tools (for workflows/UI mapping). - Awareness of AI tools (ChatGPT, Copilot, Jasper, etc.) for documentation support.

Methodologies & Delivery Context - Understanding of SDLC, Agile, or hybrid project methodologies. - Ability to work with PMs/BAs during solution handover or onboarding.

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Pre-Sales Business Analyst” and include the following information in the email content: - Current CTC: - Expected CTC: - Notice Period: - Current Location: - Total Relevant Experience: - Willingness to work at office:
summary: Seeking a Pre-Sales Business Analyst to translate customer needs into solutions. This role supports the sales cycle by gathering requirements, scoping solutions, and preparing technical documentation.

job_description:
Marketing Coordinator

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Periyar Building, Technopark, Trivandrum, 695581 Published: 16, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 22, Oct 2025

About Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS)

Founded over a decade ago with headquarters in the United Kingdom, Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 and Leadership 4.0 software solutions to world-class organizations globally, including Fortune 500 companies. With offices in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico, LTS is dedicated to meeting client requirements and addressing industrial and manufacturing challenges with bespoke software solutions across various sectors.

About the Role

LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Marketing Coordinator to support global marketing and lead-generation activities. The ideal candidate will possess strong experience with HubSpot CRM (including automation and AI features) and excel at coordinating between UK and India teams. This role involves managing daily marketing operations, coordinating content and campaigns, leveraging automation for efficiency, and tracking performance using CRM and analytics tools.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Marketing Coordination - Support the execution of marketing plans and campaigns in collaboration with the global marketing team. - Manage and update marketing collaterals (case studies, one-pagers, capability decks, product sheets). - Coordinate social media posts, email campaigns, and digital content with internal teams. - Maintain and update marketing data, lead sources, and reports in HubSpot CRM. - Liaise with content writers, designers, and video creators to meet campaign deadlines. - Assist in tracking campaign results, lead engagement, and marketing analytics.

2. Marketing Plan Ownership & Team Coordination - Maintain and coordinate the marketing activity plan (daily, weekly, and monthly tasks). - Assign and track deliverables across SEO, content creation, digital design, and social media teams. - Support campaign planning, execution, and follow-up to ensure consistent messaging and output. - Monitor content calendars, posting schedules, and marketing priorities across regions. - Provide weekly updates on progress, blockers, and completed deliverables.

3. Market & Competitor Analysis - Conduct light market research to identify trends, audience shifts, and competitor positioning. - Support benchmarking activities to improve messaging, branding, or campaign direction. - Feed insights into campaign strategy, product positioning, and content relevance. - Track changes in digital engagement, industry events, or sector-specific opportunities.

4. Performance Tracking & CRM Reporting - Measure and report marketing KPIs such as: - Lead generation (Marketing Leads vs Sales Qualified Leads) - Campaign engagement (clicks, impressions, downloads, form fills) - Traffic sources (email, LinkedIn, website, referrals) - Track conversions and attribution using HubSpot CRM. - Share weekly or monthly dashboards with Sales and Leadership. - Optimize campaigns based on data insights and performance metrics.

5. AI & Automation - Use HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks. - Leverage tools like ChatGPT, Canva AI, Grammarly, Jasper, etc. for content support. - Improve efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates. - Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Preferred Skills:

Required: - Proficiency with HubSpot CRM (marketing tools, automation, workflows). - Experience with digital content coordination and campaign execution. - Strong organizational and communication skills. - Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and deliverables. - Familiarity with Canva, Google Workspace, MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Docs). - Good Command in English (both verbal and written). - 2–4 years of experience in marketing coordination, campaign support, or CRM-based marketing.

Bonus / Preferred: - Knowledge of CMS, marketing automation tools, or social publishing tools. - Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva AI, Grammarly). - Prior experience supporting UK/Europe teams. - Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business, Communications, or equivalent.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Marketing Coordinator”. Please include the following information in the email content: - Current CTC: - Expected CTC: - Notice Period: - Current Location: - Total Relevant Experience: - Willingness to work at office:

Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com
summary: Seeking a Marketing Coordinator for global lead generation, skilled in HubSpot CRM and automation. Responsibilities include campaign coordination, content management, and performance tracking.

job_description:
Backup Administrator

Company: Gruppozenit India (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Technopark Contact Email: careers@gruppozenit.com Closing Date: 30, Oct 2025 Job Published: 16, Oct 2025 Website: http://www.gruppozenit.com

Brief Description

Our company, a leader in the IT sector, is looking for highly qualified and motivated Backup Administrators to strengthen our team. The selected candidate will be responsible for configuring, managing, and monitoring backup infrastructures for our clients, ensuring high standards of data protection, security, and operational continuity.

Main Responsibilities:

  • Configure and manage backup and restore operations using Commvault.
  • Troubleshoot backup failures and ensure data recovery integrity.
  • Monitor backup jobs and proactively address failures or inefficiencies.
  • Optimize backup schedules, storage utilization, and retention policies.
  • Perform regular testing of backup and disaster recovery procedures.
  • Ensure compliance with data protection and retention policies.
  • Open and manage support tickets with the vendor and collaborate on issue resolution.
  • Maintain documentation of backup procedures, troubleshooting steps, and best practices.

Preferred Skills:

  • Minimum 1 year of experience in backup and restore management using Commvault.
  • Strong troubleshooting skills in backup solutions and disaster recovery planning.
  • Hands-on experience with Windows and Linux environments.
  • Familiarity with storage technologies and virtualization platforms.
  • Experience in scripting (PowerShell, Bash) for automation is a plus.
  • Ability to work in a 24/7 rotational shift environment.
  • Strong analytical, communication, and teamwork skills.

What We Offer:

  • Professional growth opportunities within a dynamic and continuously evolving company.
  • Continuous training and the opportunity to obtain internationally recognized certifications.
  • An innovative work environment with access to cutting-edge technologies and challenging projects.
  • Competitive salary commensurate with experience and skills.

If you are a dedicated IT professional with strong problem-solving skills and a passion for data protection and backup administration, we would be excited to receive your application. Join us to ensure reliable and secure backup solutions for our clients!

Application Instructions: On the subject line, please mention the post you are applying for with your experience and current location.
summary: Seeking a motivated Backup Administrator to manage client backup infrastructures. Responsibilities include configuring, monitoring, and troubleshooting backup operations using Commvault.

job_description:
Klystron Technologies

Office Nbr: 2210, Yamuna Building, Technopark Phase-III, 695583 Closing Date: 27, Oct 2025 Job Published: 16, Oct 2025 Contact Email: jobs.in@klystrongloabl.com

About Us

Klystron Global is a leading provider of cutting-edge Digital Transformation solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses across various industries. With a focus on innovation and client satisfaction, we are committed to delivering exceptional technology solutions that empower organizations to thrive in the digital era.

Position Overview

We are seeking a proactive and results-driven Solution Validation Analyst to serve as the critical bridge between business needs and technical quality. The ideal candidate will be responsible for defining, analyzing, and validating robust technology solutions, ensuring they not only meet client specifications but also deliver maximum operational effectiveness.

This role requires leveraging strong analytical skills and industry knowledge (preferably in the banking and financial markets) to capture requirements, design the optimal solution, and execute comprehensive testing—including test automation—to ensure flawless delivery and successful digital transformation.

Job Responsibilities

Solution Strategy & Business Analysis (Define the Solution)

  • Lead the requirements gathering process by working with clients to understand, document, and analyse business needs, ensuring alignment with project goals and objectives.
  • Evaluate and recommend process improvements for client systems (e.g., banking and financial systems) to enhance efficiency and meet regulatory compliance.
  • Collaborate with the development team to design and implement technology solutions that meet client specifications.
  • Prepare comprehensive business requirement documents (BRD), functional specifications, user stories, and process flow diagrams.
  • Serve as the strategic liaison between clients, project teams, and other stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and managing expectations.
  • Stay updated on trends and regulatory changes in the banking and financial services industry to proactively identify impacts on client projects.

Validation & Quality Assurance (Verify the Solution)

  • Design and execute comprehensive test planning and test case design, including defining tests for functionalities and performance.
  • Develop and maintain robust test automation frameworks and perform hands-on automation for frontend, API, and/or database systems.
  • Utilize automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Serenity BDD, REST API testing, and Cucumber.
  • Perform various specialized tests, including performance tests (e.g., using Jmeter), usability, and/or security tests.
  • Design the overall test strategy for a project.
  • Assist in creating test plans, perform User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and ensure the final product meets established requirements.
  • Use defect tracking/management tools such as JIRA and work with version control systems (TFS, git).

Preferred Skills

Key Skills and Experience

  • Experience: 3-4 years of experience combining the functions of Business Analyst and Test/QA Engineer, preferably in the banking and financial markets.
  • Education: Engineering Degree in any Discipline, Master in Computer Science, or a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology/related field.

QA & Technical:

  • Hands-on experience in test automation.
  • Intermediate programming experience in one or more of: Java, C#, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python.
  • Experience in a continuous integration environment (Jenkins/TeamCity, Maven).

Analysis & Methodology:

  • Strong knowledge of financial and banking operations, systems, and regulatory requirements.
  • Proficiency in requirements gathering, process mapping, and documentation techniques.
  • Familiarity with Agile and Iterative SDLCs and project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall).

Preferred Qualifications

  • Basic knowledge of SQL and/or data query languages.
  • Experience with data analysis tools and Business Intelligence (BI) software.
  • Experience with mobile testing, cloud migration testing, or data integrity testing.
  • Certifications such as CBAP or ACP are an advantage.
  • Experience with fintech or regulatory compliance projects is beneficial.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
  • Ongoing professional development opportunities.
  • A collaborative and innovative work environment.

Application

If you are a motivated and experienced Senior Solution Validation Analyst, we invite you to apply with your updated resume through jobs.in@klystronglobal.com with the subject line "Solution Validation Analyst” and ensure the following details are included in your email: - Current CTC - Expected CTC - Notice Period
summary: Seeking a Solution Validation Analyst for digital transformation. Responsibilities include business analysis, requirements gathering, and test automation for banking solutions.
